title: How BRC-20 inscriptions sent BTC transaction fees to 5-year highs
desc: BRC-20 inscriptions drove Bitcoin transaction fees to their highest level since 2017. Here's how.

title: Dubai-based crypto miner BlueWheel Gulf signs 5 MW Bitcoin mining contract with private investor
desc: Dubai-based bitcoin mining company BlueWheel Gulf signed a 5-megawatt bitcoin mining contract with private investors. The company's total mining operations will reach 6.5 megawatts and have 2,000 ASIC mining machines.
